p: As the race for a vaccine continues, anti-viral drugs, convalescent plasma treatment, and stem cell therapies should be explored in tandem to reduce the current mortality rate which ranges from 0.1% to as high as 10% with the elderly (> 65 years of age) and those with pre-existing conditions like hypertension, diabetes, and heart disease [ 77, 151, 152]. Without access to the vaccine and other proven therapies, the best course of action in the meantime is to continue social distancing, practice good hygiene, and most importantly, check our disillusioned comfort surrounding COVID-19.
